entries.statement: The village of Horlogis exists in a temporal anomaly where each person experiences time at a different speed
Clockmaker Abel builds clocks from bone and sinew that measure emotional time
Clockmaker Brice constructs mechanical clocks of absolute mathematical precision
Clockmaker Céleste creates clocks from glass and water that follow lunar cycles
The village council has decreed that one clock must be chosen by the solstice or trade with the outside world will cease
The last attempt at synchronization, fifty years ago, caused a week of collective amnesia

intent.message: Efficiency without wonder is a slow extinction
intent.premise: In a village where time flows differently for each inhabitant, three clockmakers compete to build the one clock that will synchronize everyone, not knowing that unified time will erase the village's ability to dream.
intent.title: Les Trois Horlogers
